content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student so I don't have a lot of money. I am willing to pay 300 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's too low for my apartment. It's in the city center and very modern. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the quality of the place. Would you be willing to pay more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 350 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 350 Euro is still not enough for such a prime location. I'm sure you'll appreciate the convenience of living in the city center. Are you open to paying a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 375 Euro per month. I think this is a fair price for a student.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that. The apartment is brand new and very well-located. I'm looking for a price that reflects its quality. Would you be willing to pay 450 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 Euro per month is too high for me as a student.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, but the apartment's location and condition are quite exceptional. Would you consider any other arrangement or compromise?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not able to pay more than 375 Euro per month as a student.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 375 Euro is simply not enough for this apartment. If you're unable to pay more, I'm afraid we won't be able to reach an agreement. Thank you for your time, and I wish you the best in your search for a suitable place to live. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
